name: Destroy_the_devil
description:
You are summoned to the world as a brave
After the king's narrative.
You set foot and save the world.
You must go to destroy the devil before you can go home.

Equipment system

Equipment is divided into weapons, shields, heads, clothes, decorations
There are 5 quality stages.
As long as you have enough money to buy
Can be equipped directly, without conditions

Prop system

Props are mainly therapeutic potions
Divided into 6 quality stages
As long as there is enough money to buy.

There are also magic skills books, you can learn the corresponding magic skills after use.

Monster system

Monsters only appear in the wild map, there are no monsters in the city.
Monsters won't show up on the map, walking on the road will trigger the battle
Only one monster will appear
As long as you buy equipment, you can easily win
